reference_summary:
10pcs Baby Girl Elastic Multicolor Flower Headband Rhinestone Hair Band Susenstone®610 {'Age Range (Description)': 'Baby', 'Occasion': 'Wedding, Birthday', 'Material': 'Rhinestone', 'Fabric Type': 'elastic', 'Number of Items': '10', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Manufacturer recommended age': '0 - 5 months', 'UPC': '638823006215', 'Manufacturer': 'Susenstone®'} They're beautiful and look just like the picture! everything is solid on them! I can't wait to see our baby girl in them!! They're beautiful and look just like the picture MUSE & Co Dazzling Rhinestone Stick On Nails, White Nails with Glitter Nails and Rhinestones "French Sparkle", Luxurious Elegant Nails, Squoval Medium Length Nails Press On Nails for Women and Girls Fake Nail Set 36pcs MUSENCO {'Color': 'White', 'Size': '36 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Material': 'Gel', 'Brand': 'MUSENCO', 'Style': 'French', 'Product Dimensions': '1.97 x 4.33 x 0.79 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'MUSENCO'} Not only are they beautiful but they stay!! I’ve been so nervous to try the new stick on nails trend but decided to go in and try these. I am so comfortable with them on! I’m not scared they’re going to pop of every 2 seconds. Especially with beauty shops being shut down on and off it’s an affordable and fun way to try out new stuff! I will say I used a UV lamp I already had after applying I’ll update when I try it without the UV lamp and as the days go by to see how they hold up. Obsessed!!!! Poly Nail Gel Kit, 7 Colors Nail Extension Gel with UV Lamp, Poly Extension Decoration Kit, Base Top Coat Set with Rhinestone, Nail Molds, Complete Nail Art Gel Kits for DIY Manicure, Pink Nude Series AIFAIFA {'Color': 'Pink', 'Brand': 'AIFAIFA', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Product Dimensions': '5.9 x 5.9 x 5.9 inches; 1.5 Pounds'} Neat little set. The only thing I didn’t like about it was that the nail polish bottles weren’t labeled. Kind of messed me up at first thinking the bottom coat was the top but once I figured it out I taped the caps up so I can tell.
EDIT*** they ARE labeled!!! I’m just blind!! Neat little set MUSE & Co Dazzling Swarovski Stick On Nails, Light Pink Nails Embellished with Swarovski Crystals "Elegant Princess" Luxurious Elegant Nails, Squoval Medium Length Nails Press On Nails for Women and Girls Fake Nail Set, 36pcs MUSENCO {'Color': 'Nude', 'Size': '36 Piece Set (Pack of 1)', 'Material': 'Gel', 'Brand': 'MUSENCO', 'Style': 'Art Deco', 'Product Dimensions': '1.97 x 0.79 x 4.33 inches; 0.71 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'MUSENCO'} Got my first pair and had to get more! They’re beautiful and stick great!!!! Beautiful AOFLLU Hair Clips for Girls, 120 Pcs No Slip Metal Snap Hair Clips Barrettes for Girls Kids Women AOFLLU {'Brand': 'AOFLLU', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Child', 'Material': 'Metal', 'Occasion': "Christmas, Valentine's Day", 'Package Dimensions': '4.7 x 2.9 x 0.7 inches; 4.8 Ounces'} My daughter has very short hair and they don’t all fit up into her ponytail so we use these types of clips to pin up her fly aways. They have a strong hold and don’t fall out as easy as other brands we’ve tried! Plus the variety of colors is great so they can match her outfits. They were all accounted for as well! Highly recommend! Strong hold Pumice Stone for Feet, 2 in 1 Double Sided Hard Skin Callus Remover for Feet,Hands and Body, Exfoliator Pedicure File Block Callus Remover Scrubber (Pack of 4) KSang {'Brand': 'KSang', 'Material': 'Volcanic Stone', 'Is Electric': 'No', 'Item Form': 'Scrubber, Filer', 'Unit Count': '4.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '6 x 5.6 x 2.7 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'UPC': '192242957393'} These work great. Since stay at home order I’ve invested in doing my own pedis and these are a must! They get the job done and the colors are a cute touch! Works great Glitter Poly Nail Gel Extensions Builder Gel UV/LED Soak Off Acrylic Fashion Gel Polish Set for Nails Beginner DIY Nail Art at Home 8 colors-15g (Pink series) MIZHSE {'Brand': 'MIZHSE', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '478.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '9', 'Package Dimensions': '9.76 x 4.88 x 1.42 inches; 12.8 Ounces'} I have their blue set so when I saw the links I knew I needed them and they do not disappoint! Easy application! You will need a Uv light to help cure and a base and top coat. It also came with a bonus glitter pot as a gift! Love this brand SOFTACULOUS Foot Peeling Mask Booties – 2 Pairs, Baby Soft Skin in 7 Days SuiteMade {'Package Dimensions': '7.87 x 5.91 x 1.14 inches; 4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'STM-FMP-LAV', 'UPC': '734038263785'} I was pretty skeptical when I saw that this was a foot peel I thought maybe I would just moisturize my feet at the most. Well I was in for a surprise because after three days my feet started peeling and my feet feel amazing. I am a total firm believer in this mask and I will totally recommend it Started peeling after three days Color Changing Gel Nail Polish Set Spring Summer Mood Nail Polish for Starter and Professional 6 Colors Pink Red Blue Yellow Purple Brown Manicure Kit for Valentine’s Day Girlfriend Gift ASKITO {'Brand': 'ASKITO', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'Gel', 'Special Feature': 'Long Lasting,Long-lasting', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1.62 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Liquid Volume': '0.27 Fluid Ounces'} These gel polishes work really nicely. They play great and the color changing is so cool I’ve never seen anything like it and it’s a cool set to have in my collection. I’ve had many compliments. Cute 3 Barrel Curling Iron, Milantia 3/4 Inch Mini Travel Curling Wand Hair for Small Curly, Dual Voltage Ceramic Tourmaline 19mm Crimper Hair Iron for Women - Fast Heating, Portable Milantia {'Shape': 'Barrel', 'Brand': 'Milantia', 'Hair Type': 'All,Thick,Thin', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric', 'Product Dimensions': '9.25 x 1.97 x 1.97 inches; 12.63 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Milantia'} This works amazing on my hair heat it up fast and easy to work with. Also because it’s a smaller size it’s great to travel with. New favorite hair tool Works great
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Target Audience:** The user maintains a focus on stylish and functional products for babies, particularly girls, enhancing their overall aesthetic.

- **Product Type:** The user has shown an increasing interest in personal grooming and beauty tools, highlighted by recent purchases ranging from DIY nail art accessories to hair styling tools. Their exploration of innovative beauty products suggests a strong commitment to self-care.

- **Occasions:** The user continues to seek stylish offerings for special events, such as weddings and birthdays, aiming to create memorable experiences for their child while enhancing their own personal style.

- **Aesthetic Preferences:** Valuing beauty and self-expression, the user appreciates colorful and decorative items. Their recent enthusiasm for diverse grooming tools reflects a desire for a vibrant aesthetic in all aspects of life.

- **Quality Expectations:** The user upholds high standards for durability and functionality, favoring products that are non-toxic and cruelty-free, aligning with their wellness values.

- **Emotional Connection:** The user enjoys the intersection of baby products and personal beauty tools as key components of style and self-care. They emphasize familial bonds and nurturing instincts, viewing personal grooming as an essential expression of individuality.

Overall, the user is actively exploring stylish and innovative beauty accessories while maintaining a keen interest in high-quality products for both themselves and their child, reinforcing a delightful and aesthetically conscious lifestyle.
